entry.string: Confirm deletion of the tag type
entry.translation: Cunffurm deleshun ooff zee teg type

entry.string: Warning! This will also remove all tags associated with the tag type!
entry.translation: Verneeng! Thees veell elsu remufe-a ell tegs essuceeeted veet zee teg type-a!

entry.string: Cancel deletion of the tag type
entry.translation: Cuncel deleshun ooff zee teg type
